name: Mini Jam 111: Chroma'd
description:
Made alone during the weekend. 

Make your way through the puzlle of the various levels by fighting & using color theory... Somewhat. Your choices may doom you before the clock runs out.

Controls:
- Move: WASD
- Shoot: LeftClick
- Q/E: Choose color
- Retry: F
- Power: Spacebar

Used kits: GUI PRO Kit - Casual game
Used font: Bakari & RenogareSoft
